cards.skill:
(After a Set Order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)

COST [[Rest] one of your units] to play this card!

[AUTO]:When this card is put into the Order Zone, Soul Charge (3).

[CONT](Order Zone):When your opponent can normal call a rear-guard, they can perform the following:
• Soul Blast (1). If they do so, they choose one of their imprisoned cards, and call it to (RC).
• Counter Blast (1). If they do so, they choose two of their imprisoned cards, and call them to (RC).
